Comment: This idiot is 86 years old. He hasn’t had a role that goes beyond a cameo in over a decade. He has zero idea how films are financed these days.   Films require international funding. From the biggest blockbusters to the smallest indies. Any sort of ‘tariff’ will result in retaliation and absolutely wreck this business model. Hollywood also make as much as 55% of their revenues from foreign markets. This industry is actually one of the few industries that actually has a trade surplus with the rest of the world. Of course Trump wants to wreck it.  I wish these boomers will just grab some hamberders and do as a favor already.
